songs.lyrics:
{Verse 1}
In middle school I was told to die
High school was when I really tried
I have been an easy target
Practically my whole life
I've lost friends because I am depressed
I’m made fun of for the way I dress
And I could make an ocean with
All the tears I've cried

{Pre-chorus}
I can't believe what I’m seeing
Kids bullying for no reason
It's hard to survive when no one wants you alive and
If you aren't close to perfect
Your life isn't worth it

{Chorus}
We live in a world that's full of cruelty
This violent place we live in isn't for me
We learn about war more than love and peace
We're living in this cruel, psycho society
I hate the world that we live in
I hate the world
Oh

{Verse 2}
My crooked smile and my sweaty hands
Were parts of me that I couldn't stand
Being different was something
I wanted to avoid
But realistically, I’ll never be like anybody else and I now know
This is what I enjoy

{Pre-chorus}
I can’t believe what I'm hearing
People and animals getting beaten
We can’t be ourselves because we're too embarrassed
It takes a child to kill themselves before the school spreads awareness

{Chorus}
We live in a world that's full of cruelty
This violent place we live in isn't for me
We learn about war more than love and peace
We’re living in this cruel, psycho society
I hate the world that we live in
I hate the world
Oh

{Bridge}
Oh
Oh
Oh
I hate the world that we live in
It's asking for too much to be forgiven
Oh, I hate the place that we call home
Cruelty is all that I've ever known
Cruelty is why I'm alone
Now I'm cruel too, that's how I've grown to be
Cruelty will always be part of this
Psycho society
songs.title: Cruelty
